text:
pi*
Mr. Ralph R. Hall, Coordinator
Audio-Visual Center
Kent State University
Kent, Ohio
Dear Ralph:
I*m just in the office for a day after several weeks on the road and be¬
fore leaving again in the morning. Haven’t been under this kind of pres¬
sure for some time and regret that I can’t be of more service to you for
the next six weeks or so.
I’m asking Bob Underwood, our Network Manager, to investigate, from the
producer of each of the series in which you are interested, the atti¬
tude with regard to your listings and the clearance status of all rights
and talent. As soon as he receives this information, I’m asking that he
send it on to you directly so that those programs which can be listed
in your next revision may be included.
Sincerely, in haste.
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
